title: 🥮 "Let perseverance be your engine and hope your fuel." - H. Jackson Brown Jr.
content: Build a very simple text editor. Your editor should contain an empty string S at first, and have the functions append(t) (add t to the end of S), delete(n) (delete the last n characters of S), undo() (revert S to the state it was before an append or delete), as well as any other functions you might want to include.
